text: ðŸš¨ BREAKING: Norton Healthcare receives $20 million gift! ðŸš¨A generous donation of $20 million has been made to the "Just Imagine" campaign, which will expand programs within Cressman Parkinson's Movement and Disorders Center and Cressman Parkinson's Research at Norton Healthcare. This brings Dr. Elizabeth Cressman's total support for initiatives at Norton Neuroscience Institute and Norton Healthcare to an impressive $28 million! ðŸ’°ðŸ’•Dr. Cressman's vision has helped elevate the care for Parkinson's patients, creating a nationally known program through Norton Neuroscience Institute.
